buttons.cssCode: #buttonAnimation1{font-size: 1.25em;color: #000;background-color: #1197cc;box-shadow: #094c66 4px 4px 0px;border-radius: 0.5rem;transition: transform 200ms, box-shadow 200ms;cursor: pointer;text-align: center;outline:none;border: none;height: 2.8125rem;margin: 1px 3px;padding: 0.652rem 1.25rem;}#buttonAnimation1:active{transform: translateY(4px) translateX(4px);box-shadow: #094c66 0px 0px 0px;}

#buttonAnimation2{font-size: 1.2em;padding: 1.2rem;background:transparent;color: #2e2e2e;border: none;border-radius: 50%;box-shadow: 5px 5px 10px -3px #0000047f, -5px -5px 15px 3px #ffffff89;cursor:pointer;}#buttonAnimation2:active {box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06) 0px 2px 4px 0px inset;}

#buttonAnimation3{font-size:1.2em;padding:0.9rem 1.8rem;position:relative;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;border-radius:10px;background:#111827;cursor:pointer;color:white;}#buttonAnimation3::after{content:'';height:calc(100% + 10px);width:calc(100% + 10px);position:absolute;top:-5px;left:-5px;z-index:-1;border-radius:10px;background:linear-gradient(90deg,deeppink,deepskyblue,lawngreen,deeppink);background-size:300% 100%;animation: animate 3s ease infinite;}@keyframes animate{to{background-position:0% 0%;}50%{background-position:90% 0%;}100%{background-position:0% 0%;}}

#buttonAnimation4{font-size:1.2em;cursor:pointer;padding: 1rem;background-color:white;border-radius:0.25rem;border:0.125rem solid #121212;box-shadow: 0.25rem 0.25rem #121212;transition: 50ms, box-shadow 50ms;&&:active{transform:translate(0.125rem, 0.125rem);box-shadow: 0.125rem 0.125rem #121212}

#buttonAnimation5{background-color:#000000; color:#f26f2e;border:2px solid;transition:0.7s  ease-in-out;width:75px;font-size:1.2em;height:40px;cursor:pointer;position:relative; &&:hover{color:#ffffff;border-color:#e6fc6a;box-shadow:0 0.8em 0.5em -0.4em #e6fc6a;transform:translateY(-0.35em);}}

#buttonAnimation6{width:100px;height:40px;font-size:1.2em;cursor:pointer;background-color:#171717;color:#ffffff;border:none;transition:all .4s; &&:hover{border-radius:5px;transform:translateY(-10px);box-shadow: 0 7px 0 -2px #f85959, 0 15px 0 -4px #39a2db, 0 16px 10px -3px #39a2db}}

#buttonAnimation7{background:none;border:1px solid #7864f4;color:7864f4;padding:20px 25px;cursor:pointer;outline:none;position:relative;animation:all 1s;overflow:hidden;border-radius:10px;font-weight:bold;&&:before{content: '';position:absolute;top:0;left:0;background: linear-gradient(#7864f4,#3072d3);width:100%;transition:all 0.3s;z-index: -1;transform:rotate(-90deg);transform-origin:bottom left;height:100%;}&&:hover{color:#fff}&&:hover:before{transform:rotate(0);}}

#buttonAnimation8{padding:20px 25px;background-color:#050801;color:#03e9f4;font-weight:bold;border:none;border-radius:5px;letter-spacing:4px;overflow:hidden;transition:0.5s;cursor:pointer;&&:hover{background-color:#03e9f4;color:#050801;box-shadow:0 0 5px #03e9f4, 0 0 25px #03e9f4; 0 0 50px #03e9f4, 0 0 100px #03e9f4;-webkit-box-reflect:below 1px linear-gradient(transparent, #0005);}}

#buttonAnimation9{cursor:pointer;background:transparent;position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%, -50%);margin:0 auto;border:none;font-size:20px;padding:15px 30px;color:#000;} #buttonAnimation9::before, #buttonAnimation9::after{content:'';width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;box-sizing:border-box;transition: top 0.5s, left 0.5s}#buttonAnimation9::before{border-left:2px solid #f4005c;border-top:2px solid #f4005c;}#buttonAnimation9::after{border-right:2px solid #f4005c;border-bottom:2px solid #f4005c;}#buttonAnimation9:hover::before{top:-4px;left:-10px}#buttonAnimation9:hover::after{top:4px;left:10px}

#buttonAnimation10{position:relative;width:100px;height:40px;font-size:1.2em;border:none;outline:none;background:transparent;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:2px;cursor:pointer;}#buttonAnimation10::before,#buttonAnimation10::after{content:'';position:absolute;width:20px;height:20px;border:2px solid #121212;border-top:transparent;transition:.4s;border-right:transparent;box-sizing:border-box}#buttonAnimation10::before{bottom:0;left:0;}#buttonAnimation10::after{top:0;right:0;transform:rotate(180deg);}#buttonAnimation10:hover::before,#buttonAnimation10:hover::after{width:100%;height:100%;}

#button11{background-color: rgb(255,81,119);color:white;padding: 0.5rem 1rem;font-size: large;border:none;border-radius: 5px;cursor:pointer;background-image: linear-gradient(-60deg, #ffffff00 0%,#ffffff00 40%,#ffffff44 40%,#ffffff44 60%,#ffffff00 60%,#ffffff00 100%);background-size: 200% 100%;background-position-x: 150%;transition: scale 0.5s;}#button11:hover{animation: shimmer 1s forwards;scale:1.1;}@keyframes shimmer{0%{background-position-x: 150%;}100%{background-position-x: -50%;}}

#button12{position:relative;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;font-size:20px;background:#2e3715;color:white;border-radius: 15px 15px 15px 15px;border:none;width:140px;height:40px;overflow:hidden;cursor:pointer;transition: background-color: 0.8s;}#button12:hover{background:#afddcc;color:black;transition: background 0.8s;}#button12-text{position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;transform: translate(-50%,-50%);transition: all 0.8s;}#button12-download{position:absolute;top:200%;left:50%;transform: translate(-50%,-50%);transition: all 0.8s;}#button12:hover #button12-download{top:50%;}#button12:hover #button12-text{top:-200%;}

#button13{border:0;cursor:pointer;position:relative;}#button13-box{background-color: rgb(255,70,85);padding:0.5rem 2rem; position:relative;overflow:hidden;}#button13-anchor{position:relative;text-decoration:none;font-size:1.4rem;font-weight:700;color:#ece8e1;text-transform:uppercase;z-index:1;}#button13::before, #button13::after{content: '';position: absolute;width: 105%;height:50%;background-color: transparent;border: 1px solid rgb(134,129,124);left:-3%;z-index: -1;}#button13::before{border-bottom: 0;top:-10%;}#button13::after{border-top: 0;bottom:-10%;}#button13-span{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:120%;height:110%;background-color:#2c303d;transform:translateX(-105%) skew(-10deg);transition: 0.8s ease;}#button13:hover #button13-span{transform: translateX(-5%) skew(-10deg);}

#buttonAnimation14{width: 130px;height: 50px;cursor: pointer;color: white;font-size: 18px;border-radius: 5px;border: none;position:relative;background: #1e272e;transition: 0.05s ease;}#buttonAnimation14::after{content:'';width:100%;height: 100%;background-image: radial-gradient(circle farthest-corner at 10% 20%, #e056fd 17.8%, #0fbcf9 100.2%);filter:blur(20px);z-index:-1;position:absolute;left: 0;top:0;}#buttonAnimation14:hover{transform: scale(0.9);background:radial-gradient(circle farthest-corner at 10% 20%, #e056fd 17.8%, #0fbcf9 100.2%);transition: 0.5s ease-in-out;}

buttons.htmlCode:
Hover me
Click me
buttons.cssCode: .buttonAnimation15-container{display:block;width: 120px;height: 60px;position:relative;cursor:pointer;}.buttonAnimation15{width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;line-height: 60px;text-align:center;transform-origin: 50% 50% -30px;transition: all .2s ease;backface-visibility: hidden;}.buttonAnimation15-1{background-color: black;color:white;transform: rotateX(0deg);}.buttonAnimation15-2{background-color: #8d52d2;color:white;transform: rotateX(90deg);}.buttonAnimation15-container:hover .buttonAnimation15-1{transform: rotateX(-90deg);}.buttonAnimation15-container:hover .buttonAnimation15-2{transform: rotateX(0deg);}
buttons.author: @learnweb_with_palak

buttons.cssCode: #buttonAnimation16{color: white;background-color: black;border:none;border-radius: 4px;cursor: pointer;transition:rotate 300ms;}#buttonAnimation16:hover{rotate:-2deg;}#buttonAnimation16:active{rotate:none;}#buttonAnimation16-text{isolation: isolate;font-size: 20px;overflow: hidden;display:block;background-color: #ccab88;background-image: linear-gradient(to right, #eb3349 0%, #f45c43 51%, #eb3349 100%);border: 2px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.7);border-radius: 4px;padding: 12px 24px;transition: translate 300ms;}#buttonAnimation16:hover #buttonAnimation16-text{translate: -6px -6px;}#buttonAnimation16:active #buttonAnimation16-text{translate: none;}#buttonAnimation16-reflection{display:block;position:relative;z-index:-1;transition: translate 600ms;transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.34, 1.56, 0.64, 1);}#buttonAnimation16-reflection::before, #buttonAnimation16-reflection::after{content: '';position:absolute;inset: 0;margin-block: auto;height: 150px;rotate:25deg;}#buttonAnimation16-reflection::before{background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);left: -15px;width: 10px;}#buttonAnimation16-reflection::after{background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);left: 5px;width: 40px;}#buttonAnimation16:hover #buttonAnimation16-reflection{translate: 150% 0;}#buttonAnimation16:active #buttonAnimation16-reflection{translate: none;}

buttons.htmlCode: Hover me
buttons.cssCode: .buttonAnimation17-container{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items: center;width: 120px;height: 45px;position:relative;cursor:pointer;transform: all .4s;}.buttonAnimation17-container:hover{background: #7b21d6;color:white;transition: all .4s;transition-delay: 1s;font-size: 1rem;}.buttonAnimation17-d1, .buttonAnimation17-d2{position:absolute;width: 100%;height: 4px;transform: scaleX(0);background:#7b21d6; transition: all .4s;transition-delay: .4s;}.buttonAnimation17-d1{top:0;transform-origin:left;}.buttonAnimation17-d2{bottom:0;transform-origin:right;}.buttonAnimation17-container:hover .buttonAnimation17-d1, .buttonAnimation17-container:hover .buttonAnimation17-d2{transform:scaleX(1);transition-delay:0s;}.buttonAnimation17-d3, .buttonAnimation17-d4{position:absolute;width: 4px;height: 100%;transform: scaleY(0);background:#7b21d6; transition: all .4s;}.buttonAnimation17-d3{left:0;transform-origin:bottom;}.buttonAnimation17-d4{right:0;transform-origin:top;}.buttonAnimation17-container:hover .buttonAnimation17-d3, .buttonAnimation17-container:hover .buttonAnimation17-d4{transform:scaleY(1);transition-delay: .4s;}

#buttonAnimation18{background:linear-gradient(to right, #240b36, #c31432);width:120px;height:40px;border:none;font-size:1.1rem;color:white;cursor:pointer;border-radius: 0 25px;position:relative;transition: all .6s;}#buttonAnimation18:hover{border-radius: 25px 0;}#buttonAnimation18::before{content:'';position:absolute;top:0;left:0;background: linear-gradient(to right, #240b36, #c31432);width:100%;height: 100%;filter:blur(22px);transform: scale(0.9, 0.8) translateY(20px);z-index:-1;opacity:0;transition: all .6s;}#buttonAnimation18:hover::before{opacity:1;}

.buttonAnimation19 {scale: 0.7;padding: 0 50px;width: 180px;height: 64px;background: black;color: white;border-radius: 32px;font-size: 20px;font-weight: bold;cursor: pointer;position: relative;z-index: 1;overflow: hidden;}.buttonAnimation19:hover {color: black;}.buttonAnimation19:after {content: '';background: white;position: absolute;z-index: -1;left: -20%;right: -20%;top: 0;bottom: 0;transform: skewX(-45deg) scale(0, 1);transition: all 0.5s;}.buttonAnimation19:hover:after {transform: skewX(-45deg) scale(1, 1);-webkit-transition: all 0.5s;transition: all 0.5s;}

.buttonAnimation20 {scale: 0.7;position: absolute;width: 160px;height: 64px;border-radius: 32px;border: none;background-color: #8f44fd;font-family: inherit;font-size: 18px;color: white;cursor: pointer;display: flex;align-items: center;justify-content: center;}.buttonAnimation20:hover {animation: jello-horizontal 0.9s both;}@keyframes jello-horizontal {0% {transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1);}30% {transform: scale3d(1.25, 0.75, 1);}40% {transform: scale3d(0.75, 1.25, 1);}50% {transform: scale3d(1.15, 0.85, 1);}65% {transform: scale3d(0.95, 1.05, 1);}75% {transform: scale3d(1.05, 0.95, 1);}100% {transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1);}}

.buttonAnimation21{background: white;color: #091540;padding:0.5rem 1rem;border:none;border-radius:0.25rem;cursor:pointer;font-size:1rem;font-weight:600;transition:0.3s ease;position:relative;height:38px;width:125px;}.buttonAnimation21:hover{scale:1.05;}.buttonAnimation21::after{border-radius: 0.25rem;position:absolute;z-index:-1;content:'';top:-2px;left:-2px;width:130px;height:42px;background: linear-gradient(145deg, #f9a826, #f9627d);transition: all 0.3s ease;}.buttonAnimation21:hover::after{background: linear-gradient(145deg,#f9627d,#f9a826);}
buttons.author: @tom.is.coding

buttons.cssCode: .buttonAnimation23-container{position:relative;width:120px;height:45px;border: 2px solid #2196f3;border-radius: 8px;transition: .5s ease-in-out;}.buttonAnimation23{position: absolute;width:100%;height:100%;border:none;color:#2196f3;background:none;outline:none;font-size:15px;font-weight:700;transition: .7s ease-in-out;border-radius:8px;}.buttonAnimation23-width{position:absolute;width: 0;height: 100%;background-color: #2196f3;top: 0;left: 0;transition: .5s ease-in-out;z-index:-1;}.buttonAnimation23-width2{position:absolute;display: block;width: 0;height: 100%;background-color: #2196f3;top: 0;right: 0;transition: .5s ease-in-out;z-index:-1;}.buttonAnimation23-container:hover .buttonAnimation23-width{width: 50%;border-radius: 30px 0 0 30px;}.buttonAnimation23-container:hover .buttonAnimation23{transform: scale(1.1);color:white;}.buttonAnimation23-container:hover .buttonAnimation23-width2{width: 50%;border-radius: 0 30px 30px 0;}.buttonAnimation23-container:hover{border-radius: 30px;box-shadow: 0 0 10px #2196f3, 0 0 30px #2196f3, 0 0 60px #2196f3;}
buttons.author: @coderx.muneeb

buttons.cssCode: .buttonAnimation24{width:130px;height:45px;border:none;color:#444444;font-size:1.05rem;font-weight:700;border-radius: 50px;background: white;cursor:pointer;box-shadow:20px 20px 60px #d9d9d9, -20px -20px 60px #ffffff;position:relative;}.buttonAnimation24::before{content: '';position:absolute;top: -10%;left: -5%;width:110%;height: 120%;border-radius: 50px;z-index: -1;background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ffd800, #ff5520,#750cf2, #0cbcf2);transform: scale(0.8);transition: transform .4s;}.buttonAnimation24::after{content: '';position:absolute;top: 0;left: 0;right: 0;bottom:0;z-index: -2;background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ffd800, #ff5520,#750cf2, #0cbcf2);filter: blur(10px);transform: scale(0.5);transition: transform .4s;}.buttonAnimation24:hover::after, .buttonAnimation24:hover::before{transform: scale(1);}
buttons.author: @coding_gyan

loaders.cssCode: .loader1{display:flex;justify-content: space-between;align-items:center;gap:8px;width:60px;height:40px;}.loader1-bar{height:40px;display:flex;width:10px;height:6px;border-radius:8px;background:orange;animation: audio-wave 2.2s infinite ease-in-out;}.loader1-bar:nth-child(2){left:11px;animation-delay: 0.2s;}.loader1-bar:nth-child(3){left:22px;animation-delay:0.4s;}.loader1-bar:nth-child(4){left:33px;animation-delay: 0.6s;}.loader1-bar:nth-child(5){left:44x;animation-delay: 0.8s;}.loader1-bar:nth-child(5){left:55px;animation-delay: 1s;}@keyframes audio-wave{0%{height: 6px;transform: translateY(0px);background: #ff8e3a;}25%{height: 40px;transform: translateY(-5px) scaleY(1.7);background: #ed509e;}50%{height: 6px;transform: translateY(0px);background: #9c73f8;}100%{height: 6px;transform: translateY(0px);background: #0fccce;}}

#loader2-container{height:100%;width:100%;margin:0;display:flex;justify-content:center;flex-direction: column;align-items:center;}#loader2-shadow{height:5px;width:12px;background: black;filter:blur(10px);animation: infinite shadow 3s;}#loader2{background: #9066ee;transform: translate(0,-30px);z-index:1;height: 30px;width:30px;border-radius:50%;box-shadow:0 0 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5);animation: infinite 3s hop;}@keyframes shadow {0%{width: 30px;opacity:1;}25%{width: 18px;opacity:1;}50%{transform: translateY(0);opacity:1;}75%{width: 30px;opacity: 1;}100%{opacity:0;}}@keyframes hop {0%{transform: translateY(0);width: 30px;height: 30x;border-radius:50%;}25%{transform: translateY(-30px);width: 30px;height: 30px;border-radius:50%;}50%{transform: translateY(6px);width: 30px;height: 24px;border-radius:50%;}75%{transform: translateY(-30px);width: 30px;height: 30px;border-radius:50%;}90%{border-radius: 20%;}100%{width: 100%;height: 100%;border-radius: 0;}}

.loader3-container{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;gap: 10px;}.loader3-dot{height:10px;width:10px;background: black;border-radius: 50%;animation:shadow 3s infinite;transition: transform 1s;}@keyframes shadow {0%{transform: scale(1)}25%{transform: scale(1.4)}50%{transform: scale(1.6)}75%{transform: scale(1.4)}100%{transform: scale(1)}}

.loader4-container{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;gap: 10px;}.loader4-dot{height:15px;width:15px;background: rgb(120,120,238);border-radius: 50%;animation: bounce 3s infinite;transform-origin: top;}.loader4-dot:nth-child(2){background: rgb(247,77,77);animation-delay:0.1s;}.loader4-dot:nth-child(3){background: rgb(59,243,59);animation-delay:0.3s;}.loader4-dot:nth-child(4){background: rgb(245,231,37);animation-delay:0.5s;}.loader4-dot:nth-child(5){background: rgb(93,93,230);animation-delay:0.7s;}@keyframes bounce {0%{transform: translateY(0);}50%{transform: translateY(-20px);}100%{transform: translateY(0);}

.loader5{width:20px;height:20px;border-radius:50%;background: black;box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 #0004;animation: pulse 1.5s infinite linear;position: relative;}.loader5::before, .loader5::after{content: '';position: absolute;inset: 0;border-radius: inherit;box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 #0004;animation: inherit;animation-delay: -0.5s;}.loader5::after{animation-delay: -1s;}@keyframes pulse {100%{box-shadow: 0 0 0 40px #0000}}

.loader6{width:45px;height:40px;--c: linear-gradient(currentColor 0 0);background: var(--c) 0% 100%, var(--c) 50% 100%, var(--c) 100% 100%;background-size: 9px 100%;background-repeat: no-repeat;animation: bars 1s infinite linear;}@keyframes bars {20%{background-size: 9px 60%, 9px 100%, 9px 100%;}40%{background-size: 9px 80%, 9px 60%, 9px 100%;}60%{background-size: 9px 100%, 9px 80%, 9px 60%;}80%{background-size: 9px 100%, 9px 100%, 9px 80%;}}

.loader7{font-size: 20px;padding: 0 5px 8px 0;background: repeating-linear-gradient(90deg, currentColor 0 8%, #0000 0 10%) 200% 100%/200% 3px no-repeat;animation: classic 2s steps(6) infinite;}@keyframes classic{to{background-position: 80% 100%;}}

.loader8 {scale: 0.7;width: 48px;height: 48px;border: 2px solid rgb(255 255 255 / 10%);border-radius: 50%;display: inline-block;position: relative;box-sizing: border-box;animation: rotation 1s linear infinite;}.loader8::after {content: '';box-sizing: border-box;position: absolute;left: 50%;top: 0;background: #8f44fd;width: 3px;height: 24px;transform: translateX(-50%);}@keyframes rotation {0% {transform: rotate(0deg);}100% {transform: rotate(360deg);}}
loaders.author: @frontendjoe

loaders.cssCode: .loader9 {scale: 0.65;width: 56px;height: 56px;display: grid;border-radius: 50%;-webkit-mask: radial-gradient(farthest-side, #0000 40%, #8f44fd 41%);background: linear-gradient(0deg,rgb(143 68 253 / 50%) 50%,rgb(143 68 253 / 0%) 0)center/4.5px 100%,linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(143 68 253 / 25%) 50%, rgb(143 68 253 / 75%) 0)center/100% 4.5px;background-repeat: no-repeat;animation: spinner-d3o0rx 1s infinite steps(12);}.loader9::before,.loader9::after {content: '';grid-area: 1/1;border-radius: 50%;background: inherit;opacity: 0.915;transform: rotate(30deg);}.loader9::after {opacity: 0.83;transform: rotate(60deg);}@keyframes spinner-d3o0rx {100% {transform: rotate(1turn);}}
loaders.author: @frontendjoe

loaders.cssCode: .loader10 {scale: 0.6;width: 56px;height: 56px;border-radius: 50%;padding: 1.1px;background: conic-gradient(#0000 10%, #8f44fd) content-box;-webkit-mask: repeating-conic-gradient(#0000 0deg,#000 1deg 20deg,#0000 21deg 36deg),radial-gradient(farthest-side,#0000 calc(100% - 9px),#000 calc(100% - 9px));-webkit-mask-composite: destination-in;mask-composite: intersect;animation: spinner-d55elj 1s infinite steps(10);}@keyframes spinner-d55elj {to {transform: rotate(1turn);}}
loaders.author: @frontendjoe

loaders.cssCode: .loader11 {position: absolute;scale: 0.45;width: 44.8px;height: 44.8px;color: #8f44fd;background: linear-gradient(currentColor 0 0),linear-gradient(currentColor 0 0), linear-gradient(currentColor 0 0),linear-gradient(currentColor 0 0);background-size: 23.4px 23.4px;background-repeat: no-repeat;animation: shapes-53h9rpmd 2s infinite cubic-bezier(0.3, 1, 0, 1);}@keyframes shapes-53h9rpmd {0% {background-position: 0 0, 100% 0, 100% 100%, 0 100%;}33% {background-position: 0 0, 100% 0, 100% 100%, 0 100%;width: 67.2px;height: 67.2px;}66% {background-position: 100% 0, 100% 100%, 0 100%, 0 0;width: 67.2px;height: 67.2px;}100% {background-position: 100% 0, 100% 100%, 0 100%, 0 0;}}
loaders.author: @frontendjoe

loaders.cssCode: :root{--blue: #61afef;--yellow: #d19a66;--pink: #c678dd;--green: #98c37;}.bg-blue{background-color: var(--blue)}.bg-yellow{background-color: var(--yellow)}.bg-pink{background-color: var(--pink)}.bg-green{background-color: var(--green)}.loader12-container{display: flex;justify-content: center;align-items: center;flex-direction: column;scale: 0.7;}.loader12-code-l{display: inline-block;width:36px;height:7px;border-radius:10px;}.loader12-code-m{display: inline-block;width: 24px;height: 7px;border-radius: 10px;}.loader12-code-s{display: inline-block;width: 12px;height: 7px;border-radius: 10px;}.loader12-row{margin: 0 2px;}.animated{animation: slideIn 2.5s var(--d) ease infinite;}@keyframes slideIn {from{opacity: 0;transform: translateX(100%);}to{opacity: 1;transform: translateX(0);}}
loaders.author: @tom.is.coding

loaders.cssCode: .loader13 {scale: 0.7;translate: 0 2px;width: 32px;height: 62px;display: inline-block;position: relative;border: 2px solid rgb(255 255 255 / 10%);box-sizing: border-box;animation: animloader 2s linear infinite alternate;color: #8f44fd;border: 1px solid black;border-radius: 0 0 4px 4px;transform: perspective(140px) rotateX(-45deg);}@keyframes animloader {0% {box-shadow: 0 0 inset;}100% {box-shadow: 0 -70px inset;}}
loaders.author: @frontendjoe

loaders.cssCode: .loader14{background:white;width:80px;height:80px;border-radius:50%;position: relative;}.loader14::before{content: '';background-color:black;position:absolute;display:block;height:100%;width:100%;border-radius:50%;z-index: -1;animation: 3.5s moon infinite alternate;}@keyframes moon{0%{transform: translateX(20px) scale(0.9);box-shadow:none:}50%{transform: translate(0px,0px) scale(1.02);box-shadow: 0 0 10px #0000, 0 0 80px 2px #0000;}100%{transform: translateX(-20px) scale(0.9);box-shadow:none:}}
loaders.author: No identified

cards.cssCode: .wrapper{border-radius:15px;box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);width: 300px;htight: 300px;overflow: hidden;cursor: pointer;position: relative;}.wrapper-image{width: 100%;height:100%;object-fit: cover;transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;}.wrapper-image:hover{transform: scale(1.4);filter:blur(5px);}.wrapper:hover .wrapper-title{opacity:1;}.wrapper-title{opacity: 0;border-radius: 5px;background: rgba(219,217,217,0.368);padding: 15px;position:absolute;color:black;bottom:40px;left: 4px;right: 4px;font-size: 23px;font-weight: 600;text-align:center;margin-top:10px;transition: opacity 0.5 ease-in-out;}

cards.htmlCode:
Tommy Shelby
@ShelbyCompany
cards.cssCode: .card2{width:300px;aspect-radio: 1/1.3;position:relative;height:400px;}.image-box2{width:100%;height:100%;overflow:hidden;}.image-box2-img{display:block;width:100%;height:100%;object-fit:cover;filter:grayscale(0) birghtness(1);scale: 1.2;transition:scale 2s ease-in-out, filter 1s ease-in-out;}.image-box2-img:hover{filter:grayscale(1) brightness(0.7);scale: 1;}.text-box2{position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;transform: translate(-50%,-50%);text-align:center;color:white;}.text-box2 :is(.main-card2, .sub-card2){height: 34px;line-height: 34px;overflow:hidden;}.main-card2{font-size: 18px;font-weight: 600;text-transform: uppercase;position:relative;}.sub-card2{font-size:14px;font-weight:300;}.name-card2, .address-card2{display:block;transition: transform 0.5 ease;}.name-card2{transition-delay: 0.2s;transform: translateY(100%);}.address-card2{transform: translateY(-100%);transition-delay: 0.5s}.card2:hover .text-box2 :is(span){transform: translateY(0%);}.text-box2::after{position:absolute;content:'';top: 52%;left:50%;width: 180%;height: 3px;transform: translate(-50%,-50%) scaleX(0);transform-origin: left;transition: 0.5 ease;background-color: cyan;}.card2:hover .text-box2::after{transform: translate(-50%,-50%) scaleX(1);}

cards.htmlCode:
John Shelby

The third Peaky Blinder brother
cards.cssCode: .card3-container{width:20rem;height:20rem;position:relative;overflow:hidden;}.card3-img{width:100%;height:100%;transition: all 1s;}.card3-box-content{position: absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;display: flex;flex-direction: column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;color: white;transition: all 1s;background: rgb(23,23,23);transform: translateX(-100%);}.card3-container:hover .card3-box-content{transform: translateX(0);}

cards.htmlCode:
Ada Shelby

Sister of the Peaky Blinders
cards.cssCode: .card4-container{width:20rem;height:20rem;position:relative;overflow:hidden;}.card4-img{width:100%;height:100%;object-fit:cover;scale 1.15;transition: opacity 0.25s, scale 0.35s;}.card4-container:hover .card4-img{opacity: 0.7;scale: 1.4;}.card4-box-content{position: absolute;inset: 0;color: white;padding: 50px;text-align:center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;justify-content:end;align-items:center;gap: 15px;}.card4-box-content::before{content: '';position:absolute;inset: 20px;border: 2px solid white;opacity: 0;scale: 1.25;transition: opacity 0.25s, scale 0.25s;}.card4-container:hover .card4-box-content::before{opacity: 1;scale: 1;}.card4-title{letter-spacing: 1px;font-size: 2em;text-transform: uppercase;text-shadow: 1px 1px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.8);}.card4-content{font-size: 1em;opacity:0;translate: -25px;transition: opacity 0.25s, translate 0.25s;}.card4-container:hover .card4-content{opacity: 1;translate : 0;}

cards.htmlCode:
Polly Gray

She is the mother of Michael and Anna Gray, aunt of Arthur, Thomas, John, Ada and Finn Shelby, as well as being the matriarch of the Shelby Family. She is part of the Birmingham criminal gang, the Peaky Blinders, a certified accountant and company treasurer of Shelby Company Limited.
cards.cssCode: .card5-container{position: relative;display: flex;align-items:center;justify-content: center;width: 350px;max-width: 100%;height:300px;background: white;border-radius: 20px;transition: 0.5s;box-shadow: 0 35px 80px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)}.card5-container:hover{height: 400px;}.card5-img-box{position:absolute;top:20px;width:300px;height:220px;backgroud: #333333;border-radius: 12px;overflow: hidden;transition: 0.5s;}.card5-container:hover .card5-img-box{top: -100px;scale:0.75;box-shadow:0 15px 45px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);}.card5-img{position:absolute; top: 0;left: 0;width: 100%;height: 100%;object-fit:cover;}.card5-content{position:absolute;top:252px;width:100%;height: 30px;text-align:center;overflow:hidden;transition: 0.5s;}.card5-container:hover .card5-content{top:130px;height: 250px;}.card5-title{font-size: 1.6rem;font-weight: 700;color: #333333;}.card5-text{color: #333333;padding: 0 30px;margin-top: 20px;}.card5-button{position:relative;top: 15px;display: inline-block;padding: 12px 25px;background: #181818;color: white;font-weight: 500;margin-top: 20px;border: none;cursor:pointer;}.card5-button:hover{opacity: 0.8;}@media (max-width: 480px){.card5-container{width: 230px;border-radius: 15px;}.card5-img-box{width: 185px;border-radius: 10px;}.card5-text{font-size: 0.8rem;}.card5-button{font-size: 0.9rem;}}
cards.author: @Codingkite

<

Title

slidesCode.cssCode: .carrousel {display: flex;flex-direction: row;width: 100%;max-width: 100rem;margin-top: 8dvh;height: 92dvh;background-color:rgba(186, 186, 186, 0.8);position: relative;}.back {top: 0;left: 0;}.back:link, .forth:link{background: transparent;}.backward,.forward {background: grey;border-radius: 10px;padding: 5px 10px;text-align: center;color: black;:focus{outline:none;}}.backward:hover,.forward:hover {background: rgb(68, 68, 68);}.forth {top: 0;right: 0;}.button-carousel {display: flex;justify-content: center;align-items: center;position: absolute;width: 100px;height: 100%;font-size: 35px;font-weight: bold;background: transparent;cursor: pointer;z-index: 1;}.carrousel-image {width: 100%;height: 100%;object-fit: cover;transition: all 0.5s;cursor: pointer;}.picture {object-fit: cover;position: relative;width: 100%;height: 100%;}.carousel-title {display: flex;justify-content: center;align-items: center; position: absolute;bottom: 0;right: 0;width: 100%;margin: 0 auto;padding: 0 20px;height: 60px;font-size: 1.5rem;z-index: 1;background: rgba(186, 186, 186, 0.8);color: black;}
slidesCode.jsCode: const carousel = document.querySelector('.carrousel');const carouselTitle = document.querySelector('.carousel-title');let currentPosition = 0;const buttonBackward = document.querySelector('.backward').addEventListener('click', (e) => Backward());const carrouselImage = document.querySelector('.carrousel-image');const picture = document.querySelector('.picture');const buttonForward = document.querySelector('.forward').addEventListener('click', (e) => Forward());const checkMobile = window.matchMedia('screen and (max-width: 992px)').matches;picture.addEventListener('click', (e) => {showMovieContent(e.target.id);});function Backward() {if (currentPosition <= 0) {currentPosition = myJson.top5.length - 1;}else {currentPosition--;if (window.matchMedia('screen and (max-width: 992px)').matches) {showCarrouselImage(myJson.top5[currentPosition].imageUrl , myJson.top5[currentPosition].id,myJson.top5[currentPosition].title);}else {showCarrouselImage(myJson.top5[currentPosition].image2Url,myJson.top5[currentPosition].id , myJson.top5[currentPosition].title);}}function Forward() {if (currentPosition >= myJson.top5.length - 1) {currentPosition = 0;}else {currentPosition++;if (window.matchMedia('screen and (max-width: 992px)').matches) {showCarrouselImage(myJson.top5[currentPosition].imageUrl , myJson.top5[currentPosition].id , myJson.top5[currentPosition].title);}else {showCarrouselImage(myJson.top5[currentPosition].image2Url , myJson.top5[currentPosition].id , myJson.top5[currentPosition].title);}}function showCarrouselImage(url, id, alt) {picture.setAttribute('id', id);picture.setAttribute('src', url);picture.setAttribute('alt', alt);carouselTitle.textContent = alt;}function runCarousel() {setInterval(Forward, 5000);}}runCarousel()

slidesCode.cssCode: .carousel-secondContent{position:relative;width:320px;margin:100px auto 0 auto;perspective:2000px;}.carousel{position:absolute;width:100%;height:100%;transform-style:preserve-3d;animation:rotate360 60s infinite forwards linear;}.image{position:absolute;border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.7);width:300px;height:187px;top:20px;left:10px;right:10px;background-size:cover;box-shadow:inset 0 0 0 2000px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);display:flex}.image > span{margin:auto;font-size:2rem;} @keyframes rotate360{from{transform: rotateY(0deg);}to{transform: rotateY(-360deg);}}.image:nth-child(1){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(0deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(2){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(40deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(3){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(80deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(4){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(120deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(5){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(160deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(6){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(200deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(7){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(240deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(8){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(280deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(9){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(320deg) translateZ(430px)}

.carousel3-viewport::-webkit-scrollbar{width: 0;}.carousel3-viewport::-webkit-scroll-track{background: transparent;}.carousel3-viewport::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:transparent;border:none;}.carousel3-viewport, .carousel3-slide{list-style: none;margin: 0;padding: 0;}.carousel3-container{position:relative;width:100%;max-width:100rem;height: 50vh;perspective: 100px;overflow: hidden;}.carousel3-viewport{scrollbar-color: transparent transparent;scrollbar-width: 0px;position:absolute;top: 0;right: 0;bottom: 0;left: 0;display: flex;overflow-x:scroll;counter-reset: item;scroll-behavior: smooth;scroll-snap-type:x mandatory;}.carousel3-container::before, .carousel3-container::after{content:'';position:absolute;z-index:2;left: 50%;translate: -50% 0;width: 500%;height: 500%;border-radius: 50%;background: #fff;}.carousel3-container::before{top: -480%;}.carousel3-container::after{bottom: -480%;}.carousel3-slide{position:relative;flex: 0 0 33.33%;width: 33.33%;counter-increment: item;}.carousel3-snapper{cursor:pointer;position:absolute;top: 0;left: 0;width: 100%;height: 100%;scroll-snap-align: center;border:10px solid white;object-fit: cover;}
slidesCode.author: @frontendcamp

slidesCode.cssCode: .carousel4-container{overflow: hidden;width:600px;}.carousel4-wrap{display:grid;grid-auto-flow:column;grid-auto-column: 250px;justify-items: stretch;animation: slide 15s linear infinite;gap: 15px;}.carousel4-img{width: 200px;height: 200px;border-radius: 15px;object-fit:cover;}@keyframes slide{to{translate: calc(-7 * 250px);}}
slidesCode.author: @Antonimason

modalCode.cssCode: .notification {position:absolute;padding:5px;height:50px;bottom:4px;right:4px;width:max-content;border-radius:6px;background-color:#313e2c;color:#aaec8a;box-shadow: 0 1px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);transform: translateY(30px);opacity:0;visibility: hidden; animation: fade-in 3s linear;} .notification_icon{height:26px;width:26px;margin-right: 4px;} .notification_body{display:flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; padding: 16px 8px;} .notification_progress{position:absolute; left:4px; bottom:4px; width: calc(100% - 8px); height: 3px; transform: scaleX(0); transform-origin: left; background: linear-gradient(to right, #313e2c, #aaec8a); border-radius: inherit; animation: progress 2.5s 0.3s linear;} @keyframes fade-in{5% {opacity: 1; visibility:visible;transform:translateY(0);}95%{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0);}} @keyframes progress {to{transform: scaleX(1);}}

.clipboard{border: 0.5px solid black;color: white;background: rgb(156, 255, 7);border-radius: 10px;position:absolute;bottom: 4px;right:4px;z-index: 1;animation: fade-in 3s linear;}@keyframes fade-in{5% {opacity: 1; visibility:visible;transform:translateY(0);}95%{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0);}} @keyframes progress {to{transform: scaleX(1);}}

accordionCode.cssCode: .accordion1{width:100%;display:flex;justify-content:center;height: 400px;gap: 16px;transition: 0.3s;text-align: center;}.accordion1:hover{gap:0;}.accordion1-item-title{font-weight: 400;font-size: 24px;line-height: 45px;border-bottom: 2px solid white;white-space:nowrap;}.accordion1-item{position:relative;overflow: hidden;flex: 0 0 80px;border-radius: 50px;opacity: 0.75s;cursor:pointer;}.accordion1-item-img{position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;translate: -50% -50%;width:100%;height: 100%;object-fit:cover;}.accordion1-item, .accordion1-item-img, .accordion1-item-container, .accordion1-item-content{transition: 0.3s;}.accordion1-item-container{width: 100%;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;rigth:0;bottom:0;z-index:1;color:white;background:#02022e;background: linear-gradient(0deg,rgb(0 0 0 /70%) 10%, rgb(255 255 255 / 0%) 100%);opacity:0;visibility:hidden;}.accordion1-item-content{position:absolute;z-index: 2;left: 50%;bottom: 50px;margin: 0 auto;translate: -300px 0;visibility: hidden;opacity: 0;}.accordion1-item:hover{flex: 0 1 260px;scale: 1.1;z-index: 3;opacity:1;}.accordion1-item:hover .accordion1-item-container{opacity: 1;visibility: visible;}.accordion1-item:hover .accordion1-item-content{translate: -50% 0;opacity: 1;visibility: visible;}

.accordion2-container{position:relative;width:800px;min-width: 320px;height:500px;background: #222222;}.accordion2-clip{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;transition: all 0.5s;}.clip1{background: url('https://www.propain-bikes.com/us/wp-content/uploads/sites/4/2020/12/DSC00029-min-1.jpg');background-size:cover;background-position:center;clip-path: polygon(0 0, 46% 0, 39% 100%, 0 100%);}.clip2{background: url('https://projectgo.pro/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Site_HandleBarSeatPost_4_D.jpg');background-size:cover;background-position:center;clip-path: polygon(19% 0, 87% 0, 64% 100%, 33% 100%);}.clip3{background: url('https://www.ebike24.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/ebike-giant-computer-dash-l200-dash-m200-header.jpg');background-size:cover;background-position:center;clip-path: polygon(82% 0, 100% 0, 100% 100%, 63% 100%);}.accordion2-container:hover .accordion2-clip{clip-path: polygon(100% 0, 100% 0, 100% 100%, 100% 100%);}.accordion2-container .accordion2-clip:hover{clip-path: polygon(0 0, 100% 0, 100% 100%, 0 100%);}
accordionCode.author: @CODERS-SECTION

navbars.cssCode: .navbar1-container{width:100%;height: 6vh;padding: 20px;background: #191919;position: fixed;z-index: 1;}.navbar1-burger{display: none;cursor:pointer;color: white;padding: 3px 5px;}.navbar1{width: 100%;margin:0;display:flex;text-align:center;justify-content: center;gap: 20px;background: #191919;transition: all 1s;}.navbar1-item{list-style:none;}.navbar1-type{text-decoration:none;color:white;font-size:17px;padding:0.6rem 1.4rem;position:relative;}.navbar1-type::before{content:'';position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:2px;background:white;transform: scaleX(0);transition: all 1s;transform-origin: left;}.navbar1-type::after{content:'';position:absolute;bottom:0;left:0;width:100%;height:2px;background:white;transform: scaleX(0);transition: all 1s;transform-origin: right;}.navbar1-type:hover:before, .navbar1-type:hover:after{transform: scaleX(1);}@media screen and (max-width: 801px) {.navbar1-container{padding: 0;}.navbar1-burger{display: block;}.navbar1{position: relative;top: 0;left: 0;transform: translateX(-2000px);flex-direction: column;height: 100vh;width: 100%;gap: 40px;}.active{transform: translateX(0);}}
